formatDescription: CATIA is a 3D modelling software created by Dassault Systèmes, widely used across many industries for computer aided design, manufacture and engineering. Model files store representations of mechanical structures, or parts of structures.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Library Research Group / MIT Libraries
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.115)- Max-offset modified for BOF signature to allow for more exact signature identification. Internally researched. 04/2024 (v.118) changed first range of bytes from {2024} to *. Submitted by the J. Paul Getty Trust.

internalSignatures.name: CATIA Model V4
internalSignatures.note: BOF offset 80, magic bytes: CATIA followed by three spaces*CATIA SOLUTIONS V4{6}RELEASE followed by one space

supportedBy.name: Dassault Systèms
supportedBy.source: Digital Library Research Group / MIT Libraries

developedBy.name: Dassault Systèms
